document.title: Dupira: Dutch Parser for IR Applications
document.intro: upira is a rule-based parser, generated by means of the AGFL parser generator from the Dupira grammar, lexicon and fact tables. By means of transductions which are specified in the grammar (and can be modified), the parser transduces sentences to dependency graphs.
